div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1868 Bhutri, Hazara district, Pakistan, (149) 1933 Burial: 1st cent. B.C. (Le Rider) Contents: 495 AR, 11 AE Zoilus II: 1 dr. Strato I and Strato II: 8 dr. Azes II: 486 dr.; 8 AE Taxila: 3 AE Disposition: unknown Information from R. B. Whitehead
